PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
During traveling on the bus or the train, we carry many things like luggage and costly things, but we have the fear that somebody might steal the luggage. So to guard our luggage, we usually lock our luggage through the old methods with the help of lock and chain. After all these, we still stay in fear that any thief may break the chain and take away all the valuable things. To overcome this problem, here is a system, namely luggage security alarm circuit which is based on the NAND gate. The main aim of this system is to generate an alarm when any unauthorized person tries to steal your luggage. This system is very useful when you travel in the night time. Another application of this luggage security alarm system is, you can use in your home for the security from the theft.

We used following components:
IC1(CD4011) – 1(In a single chip, it is a group of 4 NAND Gate which are independent of each other)
Resistor
R1(1K) – 1
R2(4.7K) – 1
Capacitor
C1(.1uF) – 1
Miscellaneous
Buzzer– 1
T1(BC547) – 1
D1(1N4007) – 1

This is the Admin section of Fundoo Notes Application which is same as Google Keep.Here I used JQuery & Bootstrap additionally.This admin portal is for Admin only where one can see the number of users & user details.Admin have a power to approve questions asked by user and Services also.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: STUDY & DEVELOPMENT OF TRAFFIC LIGHT CONTROL SYSTEM
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Traffic lights, also known as traffic signals, traffic lamps, signal lights, robots  are signaling devices positioned at or near road intersections, pedestrian crossings and other locations to control competing flows of traffic. Traffic lights were first installed in 1868 in London, United Kingdom; now used in almost every city of the world. Traffic lights alternate the right of way accorded to road users by displaying lights of a standard color (red, yellow/amber, and green) following a universal color code (and a precise sequence to enable comprehension by those who are color blind). 

We used Atmega32 for auto-change signal after a specific time of interval.We also used LED lights as  a indicator. Atmega32 programmed in a manner that the respective LEDs glow by setting the required bit using programming language & a certain amount of delay is provided depending on the user.We used AVR Studio for simulation.
In this ChatApp, you can chat in a group or person to person also.Basically,I used MEAN technology to make this application.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Responsive Webpage with the help of Bootstarp 4 & jQuery
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
This is a Responsive Webpage with the help of Bootstarp 4 & jQuery.Here I used:
1.Responsive Navbar using toggle button for mobile view.
2.Bootstarp Carousel, Media Queries for different screen size.
3.Image Overlay animation with Transition property.
4.Bootstarp Scrollspy,Bootstarp Gallery.
5.Testimonials & responsive footer with Font awesome icons.
